entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
